summary:
Tony: I have no weaknesses.
Peter, screeching as he falls off the side of Stark Tower: HEY MR. STARK
Tony, suiting up to go...
body:
Tony: I have no weaknesses.

Peter, screeching as he falls off the side of Stark Tower: HEY MR. STARK

Tony, suiting up to go rescue his dumbass kid: One. I have one weakness.

body:
Prison AU fic

To those of you who read my Prison AU thing I posted the other day, I had a lot of people ask me if I could continue it.  So I did.  

I posted on A03 because it’s pretty dirty, so the link is here.  It’s not exactly the same, I changed things a little, but I hope you guys like it!

Again, warnings because this time it is actual non-con smut, so. 

Yeah, I hope you enjoy!

it’s all for you, 
everything i do,
i tell you all the time,
heaven is a place on earth with you,
tell me...
body:
“it’s you, it’s you,

it’s all for you,

everything i do,

i tell you all the time,

heaven is a place on earth with you,

tell me all the things you wanna do.”

❤️

blog.name: theincorrectavengers
blog.title: ⎊Incorrect Avengers Quotes⎊
blog.description:
Bailey • Canadian • Bisexual

Feel free to send me asks or prompts :)

https://myurls.co/theincorrectavengers

summary: “If you’re nothing without this suit, then you shouldn’t have it.”
body:
“If you’re nothing without this suit, then you shouldn’t have it.”

In Spider-Man Homecoming, we saw Tony take Peters suit away, and the scene goes like this;


Peter says “I just wanted to be like you,” Tony replying “and I wanted you to be better. Okay, it’s not working out, I’m gonna need the suit back.” “For how long?” “Forever.” “No. No-no-no. please? Please? Please? You don’t understand! This is all I have, I’m nothing without this suit.” “If you’re nothing without this suit, then you shouldn’t have it. Okay?”


Tony’s actions are somewhat justified for taking away Peter’s suit. He was worried, he needs Peter to be careful and learn from his mistake. But i feel like the main reason he took Peter’s suit away is because he needed Peter to realize that he didn’t need the suit. The suit doesn’t make Peter who he is, the suit doesn’t even make Spider-Man who he was. Peter makes Spider-Man who he is, with, or without the suit. And he needs Peter to realize that the suit is just a tool, just a small piece of who Spider-Man is. But it doesn’t define who he is. Tony is trying to show Peter that the suit doesn’t make him who he is. He makes the suit. And if Peter thinks the suit makes him who he is, it’s going to mess him up. He’s trying to show Peter that a suit means nothing if you’re not good and courageous. Tony is trying to make Peter remember that he was still Spider-Man before he had the suit. All the suit does is enhance the abilities he already has. In Iron Man 3, we see Tony declaring that whether or not he has his suit, he’s still Ironman and nothing will change that.


And we see another moment like this when Steve Rogers and Tony and arguing. “Yeah, big man in a suit of armour. Take that off and what are you?” And without hesitation, Tony replies, “genius, billionaire, playboy, philanthropist.” Tony knows exactly who he is whether he has that suit or not. Tony takes a jab at Steve by telling him “a hero? Like you? You’re a laboratory experiment, Rogers. Everything special about you came out of a bottle.” All of Steve’s abilities came from the super soldier serum, but his abilities aren’t what makes him either. Even before he received the serum Steve knew who he was. He was a fighter despite lacking good health or strength. He had good, set morales and he never faltered when it came to doing the right thing. All the Avengers know who they are and they know that they’re suits and abilities aren’t what make them heroes. Which is exactly what Tony is trying to show/teach Peter.


People may have seen Tony taking Peter’s suit away as unnecessary and cruel, but Tony did the right thing. If he hadn’t have done that, Peter wouldn’t have realized that the suit is what makes him a hero. He realizes that his morals, heart and actions make him Spider-Man and nothing else. Tony wasn’t being selfish or cold, he was being a good teacher to Peter. Thank you for coming to my TED talk-

summary: In Which Red Robin Is Done With Marvel's Shit
title: In Which Red Robin Is Done With Marvel's Shit
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2GxNmFg

by Magical_Devil_Alex

Tim Drake, also known as Red Robin, is getting really tired of this universe he’s been thrusted into. Unfortunately, they disagree.

AKA, Tim Drake is my son and I want to give him some much deserved love.

Words: 1399, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

Series: Part 5 of DC Shenanigans

  • Fandoms: DCU, Red Robin (Comics), Marvel Cinematic Universe, Marvel
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: Gen
  • Characters: Tim Drake, Tony Stark, Thor (Marvel), Bruce Banner, Wanda Maximoff, Clint Barton, Sam Wilson, Steve Rogers, Matt Murdock, Peter Parker, Wade Wilson, Literally everyone I can think of, Jason Todd, Damian Wayne, Bruce Wayne, Dick Grayson, might add more - Character, Ra’s al Ghul
  • Relationships: Tim Drake & the Avengers, Tim Drake & Bruce Wayne, Tim Drake & Dick Grayson, Tim Drake & Jason Todd, Tim Drake & Damian Wayne, Tim Drake & Dick Grayson & Jason Todd & Bruce Wayne & Damian Wayne
  • Additional Tags: Crack Treated Seriously, Basically, Dimension Travel, tim is trying okay, he’s done with everyone’s shit, Little bit of angst, Angst, BAMF Tim Drake

blog.name: iron-fam
blog.title: the one and only ironfam
blog.description:
Laika_space on AO3 | she/her | bisexual but taken | big dummy |
in this house we love tony, pepper, rhodey, happy, peter, and aunt may

summary:
Peter: Am...am I gonna die?
Tony: Of course not!
Pepper: No! No, no honey, you're not.
Rhodey: Not today, bud.
May: Absolutely...
body:
Peter: Am…am I gonna die?

Tony: Of course not!

Pepper: No! No, no honey, you’re not.

Rhodey: Not today, bud.

May: Absolutely not, sweetie!

…

Happy: Idk, he might.

blog.title: ill-o-mania
blog.description:
•I'm Laur, an adult human. He/him.

• I write stuff, draw stuff, and review films. Original and fandom content (primarily MCU; full list here).

• Fics are hurt/comfort, angst, sickfic, illness & injury, and emeto. • Drawings are largely gen with occasional i&i or nsfw. • I take commissions and prompts for fics and art.

| Check kink status here

| See characters and fandoms here

| Film Crits are here

| Buy me a coffee here

| See master story list here

| I'm on AO3 as Builder

| Professional blog is @llcupp-author

| Personal sideblog is @my-wayward-son

| Vietnam War art sideblog is @laur-draws-war

• Chat me up if you want. I’m too shy to initiate anything, but if you get my attention, I’ll respond.

summary: What about one where Peter is on patrol when he shouldn't be, Luke when he had the flu?? But anyway he goes anyway and works...
question: What about one where Peter is on patrol when he shouldn't be, Luke when he had the flu?? But anyway he goes anyway and works himself even harder only to pass out on a random roof top and Karen has to notify Tony? Maybe Peter comes to either in iron-man's arms or in the car and Tony is two-way to lecture him but Peter just turns away slightly to get violently ill and he decides a lecture can definitely wait until Peter isn't evacuating his stomach contents?
answer:
“Peter?”

“Huh?  What?”  Peter snaps to attention with one foot on the top rail of the fire escape.  He quickly jumps to the sidewalk below, landing in a crouch and wincing as the impact carries through the soles of his boots and makes his vertebrae crash together.  He sees stars for a second, then the jarring sensation fizzles out.

“Your body temperature is elevated, and you have not responded to my last four questions,” Karen’s voice says in his ear.  Ear, singular, because the other one is clogged like it’s underwater.

“Oh.”  Peter’s mask is damp under his nose, and the whistling breeze cuts through the thin fabric of his suit.  “What was I supposed to say?”

“I wouldn’t dream of telling you how to answer a question.”

“Ok…”  Peter chooses not to think too hard about how an AI executes the task of dreaming.  “Can you, uh, repeat the question, then?”

“My protocol is to signal for help once your rate of correct answers drops below 25%.”

“I thought you wouldn’t dream of–”  Peter breaks off with a cough.  He wraps his arms around his chest and forces his teeth not to chatter.  The least he can do is not stand in the middle of the walkway.  He’d probably be warmer in an alley anyway.  

“Though answers are subjective, yes-or-no questions should be answered with ‘yes’ or ‘no.’“ 

“Snarky robot lady today,” Peter mumbles.

“I was created by a snarky programmer,” Karen says.  Peter swears he can almost hear her chuckling.

“Yeah, can’t argue there.”  Peter coughs again.  He looks up and down the street, which is void of traffic.  Strange for this hour of the afternoon, but he’ll take it.  If he’s honest with himself, he doesn’t mind the excuse to call it quits a bit early.  He shoots a web up to the roof of the building next door, berating himself for climbing down in the first place.  It’s faster to move around above street level.  And easier to patrol.

Peter breaks the web’s contact with the brick as soon as his boots scrape the grainy flat rooftop.  Both feet come down flat, but his knees buckle.  He windmills his arms, but to no avail.  He collapses in a heap a few feet past a skylight.  

At least he’s not on top of it, he thinks as he lifts his mask.  And good thing, too, because Peter’s stomach seems to have remained stationary a few feet above his head.  A sour bubble grows in his throat, and a loud belch and a dribble of bile send him crashing onto all fours.

“Whoa, geez, kid.”  The soft metallic tap of footsteps and the sizzle of cooling reuplsor jets approaches behind Peter’s shoulder.  “Is there something wrong with your sensors?  I got mild distress, not…this.”  Tony opens a flap in the armor on his wrist and fiddles with a display.  “This is a health meter, not something for salsa taste-tests.  Why is the highest level ‘spicy?’“

“I believe it was in reference to a fever, sir,” FRIDAY’s voice replies.

“Oh.”  Tony’s glove retracts automatically and he yanks the mask the rest of the way off Peter’s head.  “This thing is hot.  This thing is not supposed to be hot.  Do we have a rule about patrolling when you’re sick?”

“Um,”  Peter fights the urge to vomit again.  “No?”

“Well, I’m making one.  Karen, take notes.”

“Yes, sir.”

“Alright, should be easy enough to remember.”  Tony pulls Peter up by his armpits, then leans back as the kid claps his hand over his mouth.  “No sick patrols.  I don’t like this.”

“Not a fan either,” Peter groans.  “I’ll try…not to do it again.”

blog.name: ao3feed-peterparker
blog.title: AO3Feed: Peter Parker
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive of Our Own under the tag Peter Parker. The stories are automatically posted here from the RSS feed.

title: Waste
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2E4Vrjr

by mag_and_mac

“Build a bridge across the oceans of time, and walk back across it to find this small boy. Tell him that just because his father doesn’t love him, doesn’t mean he cannot love the world. - Vicente Fox

-

“I’m not my father.” He answered, his voice steady. A glass shattered somewhere in the room, but neither turned to look.

“You don’t believe that.” She told him, retracting her arm back to rest on her side.

Words: 633, Chapters: 1/10, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Iron Man (Movies), Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Avengers (Marvel Movies), The Avengers (Marvel) - All Media Types, Captain America (Movies), Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017), Spider-Man - All Media Types, Black Panther (2018)
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: F/M, M/M
  • Characters: Tony Stark, Pepper Potts, Happy Hogan, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Steve Rogers, James "Bucky” Barnes, Howard Stark, Maria Stark, Peter Parker, T'Challa (Marvel), Shuri (Marvel), everyone, Clint Barton, James “Rhodey” Rhodes, Sam Wilson (Marvel), Thor (Marvel), Loki (Marvel), Ho Yinsen
  • Additional Tags: Tony Stark-centric, Tony Stark Has A Heart, Tony Feels, Tony Stark Needs a Hug, Hurt Tony, Hurt Tony Stark, Tony-centric, Tony Stark Has Issues, Tony Stark Feels, Tony Angst, Insecure Tony, Tony Has Issues, Ho Yinsen - Freeform, Other avengers come in later, Iron Man 1, Iron Man 2, Iron Man 3, Not Canon Compliant, Well - Freeform, Yes canon compliant but not fully, Character Study, i guess, Depression, References to Depression, References to Drugs, Implied/Referenced Character Death, (Yinsen dies), Howard Stark’s A+ Parenting, howard stark is awful, Worried Pepper Potts, Pepper Potts Is a Good Bro, Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder - PTSD, Afghanistan, The Ten Rings (Marvel), Tony Stark Has Nightmares, Wow, Not Beta Read, I’m Sorry, I love Tony I swear, I just make him suffer, Long, But short chapters, The Author Regrets Everything, Author Is Sleep Deprived

blog.name: kirsten-the-freak
blog.title: Kirsten
blog.description: Just a small New Zealand girl with big dreams. Pansexual. She/her. Thomas Sanders fan

body:
Gay Peter Parker Headcannon

I was just thinking about the song We Will Rock You and how gay the lyrics are.

One line was really annoying me though.

“You got blood on your face, You big disgrace

Waving your banner all over the place”

And now all I can see is DadTony Stark flying ‘round Queens when Peter tell him he’s gay blastsing “We Will Rock You” in an iron man suit painted rainbow waving Dr Banner like a rag doll.

summary: Amazing Spider-Man continues to impress with every issue! Such a great comic. Loved all the villains in issue 14!
